full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Information (RFI)

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-QF-128-28835
* **Publication Date**: October 12, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

#### Request for Information

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites industry feedback and comments on the draft Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) documents for the Automatic Identification System (AIS) Physical Shore Station (PSS) equipment for the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG).

The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to:

* Present the draft RFSO documents for industry review and comment
* Solicit industry feedback on the technical requirements and evaluation matrix
* Answer industry questions to ensure a clear understanding of the requirements
* Improve the final RFP and delivery of the AIS PSS

#### Requirements

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires the procurement of new AIS PSS to support the AIS network across Canada. The contract will include provisions for spare parts, documentation, training, and in-service support. The contract will be valid for a period of five years with five additional one-year option periods.

The required equipment will be distributed across 28 electronic workshops in Canada, including:

* Arctic: 2 workshops
* Atlantic North: 6 workshops
* Atlantic South: 5 workshops
* St. Lawrence River: 6 workshops
* Great Lakes: 5 workshops
* Pacific: 4 workshops
* College location in Sydney, Nova Scotia for operational and technical training.

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: October 26, 2022, 14:00:00
* Contract Start Date: To be determined

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Céline Munro
* Email: [celine.munro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:celine.munro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 661-1839
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S
